text: Monopoly is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. It was shown on ABC from June 16, 1990 until September 1, 1990 and had twelve episodes. == Other websites == * Category:1990s American television series Category:1990 American television series debuts Category:1990 American television series endings Category:American television game shows Category:English-language television programs Category:ABC network series
title: Monopoly (game show)
